# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  dev_doc.cir dev_doc.cir.sh dev_doc_q1.cir dev_doc_q1.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dev_doc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dev_doc_q1.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC/dev_doc.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} dev_doc.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} dev_doc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DEV_DOC/dev_doc.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC/dev_doc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;paramdefaults;devdoc")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC/dev_doc_q1.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} dev_doc_q1.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} dev_doc_q1.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DEV_DOC/dev_doc_q1.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC/dev_doc_q1.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;paramdefaults;devdoc")
endif()
